attributes.action: block the RBS, or any 'bailed out' UK bank, from lending money abroad, in order to buy out UK firms.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Foreign investors should be banned from using loans from UK taxpayer-owned banks, to buy out British firms.

RBS (Royal Bank of Scotland), currently owned by the UK government (via a majority 84% share, and financial 'bailouts'), are reportedly lending £11.5 BILLION to Kraft, a USA based firm, so that they can takeover Cadburys.

UK taxpeyers effectively own the bank. 

Kraft cannot afford to buy Cadbury using their own funds. 

A merger liek this will almost certainly mean major job losses for the area, and even greater strain on the public purse.

This will spell disaster, and cannot be allowed.
